item.title: Trump's week shaped by crime agenda, potential guard deployment to Chicago
item.description: Widening the federal role in security assistance in Democratic-run cities has sparked pushback from local officials who call it political.

item.title: Abrego Garcia to appear at ICE office in Baltimore amid talk of Uganda deportation
item.description: Abrego Garcia could be detained by ICE and deported to Uganda as early as this week, after his arrival to the ICE Field Office.
